stimulusHtml: If the stones are thrown at the same time and air resistance is negligible, which of the following is true?

features.html: Two stones are thrown from the same height and with the same initial speed. Stone A is thrown vertically downward, and Stone B is thrown horizontally, as shown.

choicesHtml: The two stones reach the ground at the same time with the same speed.
The two stones reach the ground at the same time but with different speeds.
Stone A reaches the ground first, but the two stones have the same speed just before they hit the ground.
Stone A reaches the ground first and has greater speed just before hitting the ground.
